prompts: Create a sleek, dark-type Pokemon with a stealthy design and striking violet patterns.
I want a graceful feline Pokemon that embodies elegance and agility, with a mischievous personality.
Generate a character inspired by a spotted cat, with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a stealthy predator, featuring sharp claws and a beautiful tail.
Imagine a creature that blends into the shadows, with unique markings and a confident stance.
Design a Pokemon with a mix of purple and yellow hues, showcasing a balance of beauty and cunning.
Show me a dark-type Pokemon that thrives in urban settings and has a charmingly sly personality.
